duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide polite and friendly greetings to all guests.
Prepare bakery products for sale, including baking, weighing, and pricing.
Maintain product quality, level, and freshness.
Maintain sanitation standards in the cooler, freezer, prep area, and sales area.
Communicate guest requests and temperature breakdowns to management.
Keep supply area neat, clean, and tidy at all times.
Perform front end duties to ensure a 'no noticeable wait' standard is maintained.
Announce specials and sale info on the PA system.
Assist in product receiving and storage.
